Comment 2: 
I suspect that everything inside a script
tag needs to be treated a single token,
similar to the handling of comments.
I don't know about the termination condition,
though - for example does </script> end the
script if it is inside a Javascript comment or
string literal?

Feel free to take a look at the HTML5
spec and the package source.
